actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for automatic cost of living adjustments in the income tax rates, the amount of the standards deduction and personal exemption.

summary.text: Fair Income Tax Act - Authorizes an automatic annual cost-of-living adjustment in the income tax rates based upon fluctuations in the price index. Provides for the adjustment of the standard deduction authorized under the Internal Revenue Code based upon such cost-of-living calculation and for adjustment of the personal exemptions. Makes the provisions of this Act applicable to taxable years beginning after December 31, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for automatic cost of living adjustments in the income tax rates, the amount of the standards deduction and personal exemption.
